feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -19.6°C
Wind: W 46 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
